evidence.claim: MediBill Health Partners utilizes AWS for serverless architecture.
They comply with HIPAA regulations for handling health information securely.
Integration with X12 transaction sets is part of their EDI solutions.
MediBill implements FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
Utilizes RESTful APIs for data retrieval and transaction processing.

icp.icp_reason: They utilize HIPAA X12 transactions for healthcare claims processing and eligibility verification.
